The lovely master bedroom has plentiful built-in cabinets and closet space, and a fireplace. Amenities include in-unit laundry, central air, parking and beautiful views of Boston, including the 4th of July fireworks! Landscaped city parks and the Charles River are your playground. See attached floor plans and brochure.
